# Logarithms

- f(x)=2^x
	- [[5.2]]
	- inverse
		- x=2^y
		- y=log2(y)
		- f(x)=log2(y)

- log[e](x) = ln(x)
- log[a](a) = 1
- log[a](1) = 0
- log[10](a) = log(a)
- log[b](a)= \frac{log(a)}{log(b)}

- f(x) = ln(x)
	- domain = (0,\infty)
	- range = (-\infty,\infty)
	- asymtote = x=0
	- x-int= (1,0)
	- y-int = DNE

- f(x) = ln(x+4)
	- domain = (-4,\infty)
	- range = (-\infty,\infty)
	- asymtote = x=-4
	- x-int = (0,1.386)
	- y-int = (-3,0)
